title: help
body:
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

replies.body:
These connection errors typically point towards something in your local network configuration that conflict with League. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
